message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for you, and I'm confident it can greatly benefit you. I'm asking for $1,300,000 to start negotiations. What are your thoughts?

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. I'm interested in purchasing it, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective, but I believe the value of this product is closer to my initial asking price.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $1,150,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I still think $1,150,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $1,050,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
